Topic.Title: Can I publish any games made with Quest?

Posts.EditableText:
Hi, I'm new here. 
Can I publish games(made with Quest) to other websites? 
And would I need to pay anything? Or do I have freedom to publish it anywhere, without having to pay anything?
Thank you for reading ;O
